MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH28 and EH29 postcode areas of Kirkliston and Newbridge. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09.00am due to a fault on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:06am on Wednesday, 17 February 2021
